user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's birthday. Can you help me gather some information about her favorite Instagram users and their following? Also, find out if she has any Instagram stories or IGTV channels.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of the user's favorite Instagram accounts.
Fetch the follower count for each Instagram account obtained in step 1.
Check if the user has any current Instagram stories.
Look for any available IGTV channels linked to the user.
